recommended_degree: Manajemen, Administrasi Logistik, Teknik Industri, Teknik Telekomunikasi, Manajemen Logistik dan Material (Sarjana)
job_description:
1. Manage PO for transportation based on logistic route best solution. 
2. Monitor POD submission activity & daily closing of Logistic provider
3. Monitoring transportation KPI (including on time delivery and system usage) of Logistic provider and Warehouse KPI management
4. Monitor warehouse business & dismantle business at regional warehouse
5. Cooperate with project team regarding truck and delivery arrangement to make sure smooth delivery until material handover to receiver
6. Monitor and handle for inbound, outbound and inventory management in warehouse
7. Warehouse inventory accuracy control and maintain
8. Manage and monitor warehouse operation fulfillment performance
9. Reverse material management handling
